TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class StructureChangedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: structureChangeType
param.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.

span.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

span.span: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中可傳回的值`structureChangeType`使用者介面自動化提供者實作而定。The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. 例如，當項目會加入或移除從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]清單方塊中，如果提供者不是能夠判斷加入或移除的項目數目，它可能會指定而非或。For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify and not or . 下表描述的資訊，所接收的事件不同結構變更。The following table describes the information in the event received by the for different structure changes. |`structureChangeType`|事件來源Event source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||已加入子系。The child that was added.|已加入子系。The child that was added.| ||已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the child that was removed.|已移除的子系。The child that was removed.| ||已加入之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.|已加入之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were added.| ||已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.|已移除之子系的父系。The parent of the children that were removed.| ||無效的子系的父系。The parent of the children that were invalidated.|無效的子系的父代The parent of the children that were invalidated| 自訂控制項可能無法提供有意義的值在`runtimeId`。Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何建構和子系加入時引發事件，或從自訂清單方塊中移除。The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

returns.span: The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

span.span: The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值可能是識別項的已加入或移除的子系，或在許多子系的情況下被新增、 移除或失效，父系的識別碼。The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 自訂控制項可能無法提供有效的執行階段識別項。Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StructureChangeType As StructureChangeType

summary.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.
The type of changed that occurred.
